calculators

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • calculators.Calculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculatorBasicOperations, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SciCalculator

    public class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, CalculatorBasicOperations
    A calculator with the four basic operations and square root operation implemented. It has a simple GUI. Allows for more than one operation at a time.
    Author:
    Ruben
